description:
On the day after the Golden Week holiday, third year high school student Koyomi Araragi finds himself saving a classmate, Hitagi Senjyogahara, by catching her when she slips on the stairs and comes tumbling down from above. He discovers that she`s impossibly light, as if she has no physical weight whatsoever….
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ひたぎクラブ 其ノ貳
